item.description: Publications of Hans Brenna Schjønberg Education: PhD in Meteorology (2022) MSc in plasma physics (2013) BSc in Physics (2011) Current employment: Cervest Previous employment: Norwegian Meteorological Institute (2020-2021) Department of Geosciences, University of Oslo (2014-2019) DNV (2013-2014) ORCID: https://orcid.org/0000-0003-2038-469X Peer reviewed publications Brenna, H., Kutterolf, S., Mills, M.
